effect_entries.effect: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn.  Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will [fail]{mechanic:fail}.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect_entries.short_effect: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
